title: A/B Test Results - Real Data
description: These are actual results from A/B tests we've run across our brands. We perform all A/B tests using ABConvert.

tests.title: Product Page - Sticky "Add to Cart" on Mobile
tests.versionB: Sticky "Add to Cart" button remains visible at bottom of screen
tests.insight: Customers don't need to "scroll back to find the button". Constant availability maintains emotional momentum during scrolling.

tests.title: Product Page - Adding "Best Seller" Tag
tests.insight: Authority labeling acts as immediate social proof, increasing trust and the feeling of "I'm choosing right".

tests.title: Product Page - Adding UGC Video Reviews
tests.insight: The brain believes eyes more than words. Authentic video = subconscious truth.

tests.title: Urgency Block - Countdown Timer on Homepage
tests.versionA: No timer, text said "Until end of sale"
tests.insight: A small difference that illustrates pressure and fear. FOMO is one of the strongest tools you can use.

tests.title: Checkout Page - "Place Order" vs. "Complete Order"
tests.insight: Words affect decision processing. "Complete" sounds committing, "Place" feels light and pleasant.

tests.title: Homepage - Adding "Trusted by 10,000+ Customers"
tests.insight: Social trust is psychological fuel. A simple sentence creates the feeling of "I'm part of a successful community".

tests.title: Product Page - Adding Delivery Time Estimate Below "Buy Now"
tests.versionB: Added text "Estimated Delivery: 3-5 Business Days" below button
tests.insight: The brain calms down when it knows "when it will arrive". Uncertainty is a psychological sales barrier – simple information removes fear and increases trust.

tests.title: Checkout Page - Adding Mastercard Logo
tests.versionB: Added Mastercard logo next to PayPal and Visa
tests.insight: The brain seeks external confirmation for security. Displaying a familiar logo triggers the feeling of "known and safe" – like buying from a brand you know.

tests.title: Cart Page - Adding "Free Shipping Progress Bar"
tests.versionB: Bar showing "You're $12 away from Free Shipping!"
tests.insight: When the customer sees a clear goal — they want to "beat the system". A psychological bar that drives additional purchase.
